response.overview: A film which uses overlayed imagery from a range of archival sources and productions that have staged and constructed the 'image' of Thailand. Encompassing reproduced artefacts and archival objects, installation, film and photography, A Puzzlement pokes fun at pre-existing notions of taste and value – high and low, historical and sentimental – interweaving elements that may be considered ‘exotic’ or kitsch from one perspective, and mundane and every-day from another.
response.title: A Puzzlement
